entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle changing to rain after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
